protocol.name: P-TABM-3877
protocol.text: Nucleic Acid Extraction Method: LiCl precipitation, DNase, Qiagen Column ; Nucleic Acid Type: total_RNA ; Nucleic Acid Cleanup: Qiagen RNeasy Mini Columns ; Amplification Method: RNA polymerase - single round

protocol.name: P-TABM-3878
protocol.text: cDNA Synthesis: Affymetrix GeneChip One-Cycle cDNA Synthesis Kit ; cDNA Cleanup: Affymetrix GeneChip Sample Cleanup Module ; cRNA Synthesis: Affymetrix GeneChip Expression 3'-Amplification Kit for IVT Labeling ; cRNA Cleanup: Affymetrix GeneChip Sample Cleanup Module ; Spike Target Element: mRNA+Target ; Spiking Control: Affymetrix standard ; Dye: biotin

protocol.name: P-TABM-3879
protocol.text: Washing/Staining Procedure: EukGE-WS2v4 ; Washing/Staining Instrumentation: Fluidics Station 450

protocol.name: P-TABM-3882
text: Data Processing/Normalization: Affymetrix GCOS/MAS algorithm used to generate probeset-level intensities in TXT metrics file.
GeneSpring RMA preprocessor and algorithm used to generate probeset-level intensities in RMA file.
GeneSpring GC-RMA preprocessor and algorithm to generate probeset-level intensities in GMA file.
